      • Comment

        public Comment(long id,
       long fromUserID,
       long toUserID,
       long itemID,
       int rating,
       java.util.Date date,
       java.lang.String comment)
        Create a new comment
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the comment
        fromUserID - The id of the user who sent the comment
        toUserID - The id of the user who the comment is to
        itemID - The item id that the comment refers to
        rating - The 'rating' that the from user is giving the seller
        date - The date the comment was created
        comment - The comment's text
